text: Gino the Chicken () is an satirical Italian television series. Originally it was a internet meme, only later it become a television series. == Characters == * Gino: A chicken singer as he gets send into the internet and befriends Andrea, a young boy. At the end of the series, Gino thanks the viewers and blows a kiss and forms a heart after he hosts a party with him and Andrea, along with Andrea's family. * Gina: Gino's love interest and girlfriend, whom he falls in love with her. * White Rabbit * Dolly * Chief Colby * RayMundo * Andrea: A young boy whom Gino befriends him. Category:Italian animated television series Category:Italian-language television programs
title: Gino the Chicken
